headline: Oil & Gas Deals Are Tanking. The World’s Top M&A Law Firm Has Been Here Before
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Kirkland & Ellis spent a decade building a billion dollar-plus energy and infrastructure business and becoming the top legal adviser for US oil and gas deals. It was perfectly placed to benefit from Donald Trump’s “drill, baby, drill” agenda. She’s Still There.US Housing Agency Vulnerable to Fraud After DOGE

headline: Fortress Income: 7-11% Yields To Make Money While You Sleep
summary: Buying right and holding tight can be a winning investment strategy. Read why EPD and CSWC stocks stand out for long-term income investors.

headline: 3 Top Energy Stocks to Buy Without Hesitation in June
summary: Enterprise Products Partners is a reliable income grower with a lofty 6.8% yield.  Oneok has delivered sustainable earnings growth and a stable and steadily rising dividend.  ExxonMobil's big growth plans should reward you.
